reviewText: Apparrently taking a break from producing short burlesque comedies, RAK Films comes through again with one button bursting film.  The character portrayed by Daniel Van Roach is very over the top.  He is absolutely fantastic.  The women thru out the film are typical RAK Films actresses, unable to contain themselves within the confines of their tops.  Just right for the fans.  Overall it is a enjoyable little film.
What a fantastic movie for the Indie circuit!  I especially think the redhead on the cover is extra fine!
